title: Product metric
summary: In mathematics, a product metric is a metric on the Cartesian product of finitely many metric spaces ( X 1 , d X 1 ) , … , ( X n , d X n ) {\displaystyle (X_{1},d_{X_{1}}),\ldots ,(X_{n},d_{X_{n}})} which metrizes the product topology.
